text: evar mītu (allāhviṉ taṇṭaṉai paṟṟiya) vākku uṟutiyāki viṭṭatō avarkaḷ, "eṅkaḷ iṟaivā! Nāṅkaḷ evarkaḷai vaḻikeṭuttōmō avarkaḷ ivarkaḷ tām. Nāṅkaḷ vaḻikeṭṭatu pōṉṟē, ivarkaḷaiyum nāṅkaḷ vaḻikeṭuttōm - uṉṉiṭam nāṅkaḷ (avarkaḷai viṭṭum) vilakik koḷkiṟōm avarkaḷ eṅkaḷai vaṇaṅkik koṇṭirukkavillai" eṉṟu kūṟuvārkaḷ
